Text:
Yet more hysterical shit-kicking idiocy from the clogged detritus of the English punk scene... 

If you want your punk rabid and brainless; you've come to the right place... just don't expect too much, ok? 

Skrewdriver may have been Nazis... but, boy, were they hopeless.... they couldn't even make their brains run on time.

File Under: 'Dunces'


http://www.searchlightmagazine.com/
